name: Rock n' Roll Mars
description:
All the scientists say that mars is a barren wasteland. Nobody expected what happend next.

You are a proud, 2nd amendment fueled, american patriot with a rocket launcher, who also happens to be the first man on mars.

Made by Andreas Clement Holmgaard
for Create Jam Spring 2021
Theme: "Other Worlds"
Challenge: "Other Lifeforms"

Assets used:
Desert wind: https://freesound.org/people/Proxima4/sounds/104320/
Explosion: https://freesound.org/people/Werra/sounds/244394/
TF2 "The original" rocket launcher sound effect
https://wiki.teamfortress.com/w/images/5/57/Sgun1.wav
